name: Stoic Wisdom
description: Timeless philosophy from Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus to guide your life.
author: Quips Editorial

quotes.content: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.
First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
